pr_title: #571 - Added docs for path patterns support & fixed GET endpoint

timeline.message: #571 - Added docs for path patterns support & fixed GET endpoint

timeline.bodyText: @olegmoz I'm not sure I like these changes as include-patterns is actually a list, would not it be better to revert changes here and add several patterns in one test method?
timeline.author: olenagerasimova

replies.bodyText:
@olenagerasimova that's not about test - it happens that original API has only one path in GET response, see https://www.jfrog.com/confluence/display/rtf/artifactory+rest+api#ArtifactoryRESTAPI-GetPermissionTargetDetails and application/vnd.org.jfrog.artifactory.security.PermissionTarget+json format description here: https://www.jfrog.com/confluence/display/JFROG/Security+Configuration+JSON
So original implementation was wrong. I noticed it only updating the docs
replies.author: olegmoz
